commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<style>main {
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-width: 600px;
}

h1 {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 1em 0 0.5em 0;
}

nav {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    margin: 0 0 1em 0;
    justify-content: center;
}

nav .navButtons {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    margin: 0.5em 0;
}

.arrow-button {
    background-color: #e3e4e6;
    color: black;
    border: none;
    padding: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

.arrow-button.prev:before {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-right: 6px solid #fff;
    border-top: 6px solid transparent;
    border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;
    margin: 0 5px;
    color: black;
}

.arrow-button.next:before {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-left: 6px solid #fff;
    border-top: 6px solid transparent;
    border-bottom: 6px solid transparent;
    margin: 0 5px;
}

.arrow-button:hover {
    background-color: #c3c4c5;
    color: black;
}

nav .navButtons .wrapperToday {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0 1em;
}

table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
}

table tr:nth-child(even) {
    /*gerade*/
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

table tr:nth-child(odd) {
    /*ungerade*/
    background-color: white;
}

table td,
table th {
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    /*
		padding: 8px; 
		*/
}

table th {
    text-align: left;
}

table td {
    width: auto;
}

table th.datum,
table td.datum {
    text-align: right;
    padding: 8px 8px 8px 0;
}

table th.dauer,
table td.dauer {
    text-align: right;
    padding: 8px 8px 8px 0;
}

table th.kg_min,
table td.kg_min {
    text-align: right;
    padding: 8px 8px 8px 0;
}

table th.was,
table td.was {
    text-align: left;
    padding: 8px 0 8px 8px;
}

</style>
